formatDescription: The NIB file format is used by Interface Builder, a software development application for Apple's Mac OS X operating system. The NIB objects are stored as an XML property list, they are unpackaged upon running an application.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: Versions prior to DROID 6.3 may not identify this format correctly

internalSignatures.name: NIB File Format
internalSignatures.note: BOF: <?xml version=("|')1.0("|'){8-256}<plist version="1.0"> EOF: IBSystem Version
